speaker: President. −
english: President. − Ladies and gentleman, we have given the floor to 10 speakers. These are exceptional circumstances, since we normally have a maximum of five. There are still a few Members who had also asked to speak. I wish to remind them that they can also make their contribution in writing, and this would of course be added to the Minutes of the sitting.
original: President. − Ladies and gentleman, we have given the floor to 10 speakers. These are exceptional circumstances, since we normally have a maximum of five. There are still a few Members who had also asked to speak. I wish to remind them that they can also make their contribution in writing, and this would of course be added to the Minutes of the sitting.
agenda_item: Environmental impact of the planned gas pipeline in the Baltic Sea to link up Russia and Germany (debate)
